resources.string: By enabling time notifications, you will be notified whenever an activity you have joined is happening soon.

By enabling update notifications, you will be notified whenever there is a new update in an activity you have joined, or if you have been removed from the activity, or if the activity has been deleted.
On the home page, you can view the activities you have joined, or use the search bar at the top to search for activities you are interested in.
Once you have searched for an activity of your interest, you will first see the event info page, which gives a summary of the activity details.
The event map shows a location of the event. Clicking on the marker on the map will provide directions from your current location to the event location.

You can also view the members and their profiles before joining the activity. The stars beside their name indicate their user rating, which is given anonymously by other users to encourage a friendly community on BoLiao.
Once you have joined the activity, you can chat with the members of the activity to discuss activity details.
To create an activity, select Create New Activity from the home page menu and fill in all fields. Your activity will be immediately made public once created.
As an activity organiser, you can edit activity info or delete the activity from the event info page. You can also appoint activity admins from the members page to help run the activity.
To let other users know more about you, you can edit your profile by selecting Edit Profile from the home page menu. Your profile is made available to all users.
